data.message:
Em

The game needs you, with all this mumble wrap it's turning into an epidemic. The days of lyricists are getting behind us, grab Dre and Kendrick,nas,jadakiss, jay Cole, and jay z that album would be fire...and call it 

DEATH TO MUMBLE RAPPERS!!

replies.message: "You put Jada on a track that's how much you suck dick in the industry" jadakiss is trash bro.
My opinion, my post!! If you don't like it..i dont care...and you don't know me so I would appreciate it if you watch your mouth..thank you!
I like the idea of the album, and Jadakiss isn't the worst rapper out there, but I'd put Tech N9ne in his place.
